resources.string: Octi can\'t connect to Google Play. Is Google Play installed and up to date? Is your Google Account logged in? Try clearing the cache of the Google Play app and rebooting your device.
No purchases found. Are you using the right account?
Upgrade to unlock additional features and support development!

You can choose between a one-time purchase and a cheaper yearly subscription.\nThe subscription starts with a free 14-day trial, after which you\'ll be charged once per year. Trial and subscription are cancellable at any time.\nSame features, just different pricing models.
Your upgrade is valid across devices on the same Google account.
Play Store synchronization may take time. Try rebooting, clearing Google Play cache or simply wait.
Multiple accounts can confuse Google Play. Log out of other accounts or install through the Google Play website, which forces associations with a specific account.
